sec_clades_title: Explore the World of Dinosaurs in Dinopedia
sec_clades_phar: Discover fascinating information about ancient creatures from the Jurassic and Cretaceous eras! Dinopedia presents interactive data ranging from dinosaur types, diets, to how they moved.
sec_clades_choice: Select one of the categories below to start your exploration!
